Solo




Solo: "This is boring..."



*Solo gets a stick with a rag on it and starts soaking up the mach fluid
that was all over in the CR Room. She soaks it up only to drip more from
every inch on body. Mech fluid drips from her and she wipes it up even more
drips onto the floor again.*

----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 11:01 AM
Subject: Red Carpet Treatment


>     Aracnia lookes over the damaged Inferno. He was a mess.....definetly
> needed a CR chamber. At the moment she was arriving at Kitkats, or the
PACK's
> base, in a small transport. She found Inferno laying the ground in stasis.
> For now he would have to remain inside the vessle.
>     The ship soared just above the treetops, scattering birds and animals
> alike. In the distance she could see the base, or cave, as it would seem.
She
> typed the landing protocols in and set the ship down 30 meters from the
> entrance. Aracnia exited and began to walk to the entrace, turning to
raise
> shileds on the transport.
>     The entrance was empty, quite suspicious, but not uncommon in these
days.
> The two metal doors stood silent as she stood before them. Looking, she
saw a
> panel and pushed a button, an intercom.
>     "Commander Black Aracnia, of the Predacon Forces, wishes to speak with
> Commander Kitkat. Please acknowledge." She said cooly, not letting her
temper
> get the better of her.
>
>     Paralysis, Tarantulas, Aerostreak, Tankkor, and Rampage remained at
the
> ship, as did Quickstrike. They were going through routines and keeping the
> ship safe. It needed a lot of maintenence, but if Kitkats troops moved in
> there would be no problem.
>     That was the question after all.....where were the two groups going to
> stay? Together at one base, or divided at two? Aracnia tried the divided
> part, and it failed. But Kitkat seemed to be a better leader, so it might
> work.
>     "Computer, locate Black Aracnia." Tarantulas said. He was in the dark
> bowles of the Predacon Cruiser. It was rusty, deserted, and scary. The
> bravest Predacon wouldnt even go in there. Thats why Tarantulas liked it
so
> much.....it was his own little nest of terror.
>     Suspended above, amongst the pipes and iron works, were the bodies of
> small and large animals he had eaten and left to rot. Parts of a few
> mainenence bots scattered the web too, he had eaten those when the animals
> had become scarce.
>     The computer responded, "Commander Black Aracnia is outside the ships
> scanning range."
>     Tarantulas rubbed his hairy palms together. That ment she was at the
> meeting. And Quickstrike, he beloved knight in mismatched armor, was
asleep.
> The spider hated Quickstrike. He had programmed Black Aracnia long ago to
be
> his mate.....now she was in love with Quickstrike. Tarantulas wouldnt
stand
> for it, not much longer anyhow. Revenge would be sweet....if he could only
> muster up a plan to do so. The witch was pregnant, prehaps he could use it
> agianst her, somehow.
>     He transformed into robot mode and left his sanctuary. Entering the
main
> corridor he ran into the ever moody Rampage. The self appointed ruler of
the
> Predacons when Aracnia was gone. He was a tyrant, he would make Megatron
> proud.
>     "Where have you been, insect? The ships computer diagnostic wont run
> itself!" He said, narrowing his already evil looking optics at the
scientist.
> Rampage was alot stranger than Tarantulas, and he thought he was alot
smarter.
>     Tarantulas pushed past him and went into the bridge. He would work,
for
> now. When this little merger was complete, Megatron dead, Hell Beast
> banished, he would step out of hiding.....he wold have his revenge on all
of
> them.
>
>
>
>
>
